title: Happy, Texas (1999)(Crazy comedy Gay interest)(opt.Swesubs)
description:
Happy Texas (1999) with Steve Zahn

Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0162360/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0162360/</a>

Hilarious crazy-comedy about two escaped convicts who must pretend to be a gay couple visiting a small town to produce a beauty pageant.

Widescreen, good stereo XviD 720x384 two-pass, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.
